title: How to Make Amlou (Moroccan Nut Paste)

steps.headline: Crush the nuts in a mortar and pestle.
steps.description:
Crush until there is a thick paste. For a smoother amlou, use a processor to grind the nuts instead of the mortar and pestle. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/87\/Make-Amlou-%28Moroccan-Nut-Paste%29-Step-1Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Amlou-%28Moroccan-Nut-Paste%29-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/87\/Make-Amlou-%28Moroccan-Nut-Paste%29-Step-1Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Amlou-%28Moroccan-Nut-Paste%29-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Spoon the argan oil into the paste a tablespoon at a time.
Serve.
steps.description: Place the amlou into a bowl for serving as a dip. If using as a spread, spread over flat breads, Melba toast, crackers, vegetables, etc., as desired.

steps.headline: Store.
steps.description: For the amount not used straight away, place in an airtight container and store at room temperature.

text:
Crush the nuts in a mortar and pestle. Crush until there is a thick paste. For a smoother amlou, use a processor to grind the nuts instead of the mortar and pestle. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/87\/Make-Amlou-%28Moroccan-Nut-Paste%29-Step-1Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Amlou-%28Moroccan-Nut-Paste%29-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/87\/Make-Amlou-%28Moroccan-Nut-Paste%29-Step-1Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Amlou-%28Moroccan-Nut-Paste%29-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Spoon the argan oil into the paste a tablespoon at a time. Stir through well to combine. Serve. Place the amlou into a bowl for serving as a dip. If using as a spread, spread over flat breads, Melba toast, crackers, vegetables, etc., as desired. Store. For the amount not used straight away, place in an airtight container and store at room temperature.
